control.name: searchLookUpEdit1
control.description: The SearchLookUpEdit provides lookup functionality using a dropdown GridControl control, and contains the Find edit box, allowing end-users to quickly filter dropdown rows.

control.name: dataNavigator1
control.description: Both the SearchLookUpEdit and DataNavigator controls are bound to the Order_Details data table.

control.name: gridControl1
control.description: The Customer and Employee columns use SearchLookUpEdit controls as in-place editors.

control.name: icbTextEditStyle
control.description: Specifies the style in which text is displayed and edited in the editor.

control.name: cePopupSizeable
control.description: Specifies whether the popup window is sizable.

control.name: ceShowPopupFooter
control.description: Specifies whether the dropdown window footer is visible.

control.name: ceShowAutoFilterRow
control.description: Specifies whether the auto filter row is displayed.

control.name: ceShowColumnHeaders
control.description: Specifies whether column headers are displayed.

control.name: ceShowIndicator
control.description: Specifies whether the row indicator panel is displayed.

control.name: ceShowHorzLines
control.description: Specifies whether horizontal grid lines are displayed.

control.name: ceShowVerticalLines
control.description: Specifies whether vertical grid lines are displayed.

control.name: ceEnableAppearanceEvenRow
control.description: Specifies whether even rows are painted using the appearance settings provided by the GridViewAppearances.EvenRow property.

control.name: ceEnableAppearanceOddRow
control.description: Specifies whether odd rows are painted using the appearance settings provided by the GridViewAppearances.OddRow property.

control.name: ceShowAddNewButton
control.description: Specifies whether the "Add New" button is displayed within the editor's dropdown.

control.name: ceShowClearButton
control.description: Specifies whether the "Clear" button is displayed within the editor's dropdown.

control.name: icbFilterMode
control.description: Specifies how to filter records in the dropdown window when typing text within the edit box.

control.name: icbFindMode
control.description: Specifies whether data searching starts automatically or manually.
